column4: Test User registration in correct conditions
column5:
A user visits the website 
Fills his information correctly
Chooses Customer
 And clicks "Sign-Up"
column6:
1) Input Email Correctly
2) Input Password Correctly
3) Choose Role:Customer
4) Press Enter on Keyboard
5) Check DB for the same info
column7:
1. Email 
2. String conforming to password Policies
3. Role:Customer
4. Clicks ‘Register’ w/ mouse
column8: System displays Login-Success Dialouge then redirects user into the system AS Customer
column14:
Redirection Rout isn’t specified,
Shall the user be redirected to
Home page or profile?

column4: Validate Radio Option "Customer"
column5:
A User visits the website 
Fills his information correctly
Doesn’t Choose Customer
 And clicks "Sign-Up"
column6:
Do all ‘Test steps’ from 2.3 to 2.6 
Without choosing Customer in radio
Check error message for unselected Radio
column7:
1. Email/String
2. String conforming/not-conform to password Policies
3. Role: Keep Customer Empty
4. Clicks ‘Register’ w/ mouse
column8:
Error Message that any of the options should be chosen, Customer radio options become red
No redirection into the system

column4: Customer Enters , his name, contact details
column5: Logged in Customer
column6:
1) Input Name in non-utf-8 language, contact as code/sql then
Go to step 4
2) input Name as String of character, Contacts as mixed String then
Go to step 4
3) input none then
Go to step 4
4) press update information
column7:
1. None UTF-8 Characters
2. UTF-8 Characters
3. Code/SQL
4. Mixed String
5. String of Character
6. Numbers only
column8:
Should fail as Update Profile Information doesn’t include
 Validation Module as per Use-Casa Diagram 4.1.4

column4: Administrator can terminate any account

When user deleted, it should be archived, yet for this scope of work, the user regardless of his role
